pages.title: Harvesting Spawners
pages.text: The $(l:enchanting/resonance)Resonance$(/l) enchantment enables you to gather Spawners and actually get them to drop to be collected by you. Using the $(l:creating_life/spirit_instiller)Spirit Instiller$(/l) you can change that spawners properties to your liking.

pages.title: Changing Creature
pages.text: Using a similar technique to $(l:creating_life/creature_spawn)creating Creature Spawns$(/l) you can change the Spawners creature association.

pages.title: Clovers' Favor
pages.text: Increases the amount of mobs that is spawned in one cycle.

pages.title: Quick Charge
pages.text: Decreases the Delay between Spawns, making the Spawner spew out new creatures even quicker.

pages.title: Pest Control
pages.text: Normally, Spawners would suddenly stop working if they notice a lot of hostile auras around them. Almost like if waiting for you to do the next move.$(br)Enchanted with $(l:enchantments/pest_control)Pest Control$(/l) it will function much more relentless, spewing out wave after wave of enemies.

pages.title: Resonance
pages.text: Makes the Spawner work even if no-one is close-by.
